database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS_1000Actinomycetes-Butanol
entry.description: Butanol extractions of small scale growths of 1000 Marine Actinomycete Strains from the Jensen-Fenical Culture Collection. The method file contains a brief description of protocols and LCMS methods as well as a list of the filenames and a .csv (open in Excel) that pair each filename with the strain and all annotations from the Jensen lab HUB server.
